turns.content:
Generate character suggestions for:
Name: Unknown
Race: Unknown
Alignment: Unknown

Provide a JSON response with:
- personality: A brief personality description (2-3 sentences)
- background: A brief background story (2-3 sentences)
- abilities: An array of 3-5 ability names

Return ONLY valid JSON, no markdown or extra text.

{
  "name": "Unknown",
  "race": "Unknown",
  "alignment": "Unknown",
  "personality": "This character is an enigma, their motives and desires veiled by a mysterious aura. They are adaptable, often adjusting their behavior to suit the situation and leaving those around them guessing their true nature.",
  "background": "Born into obscurity, this character has journeyed through the cosmos, their past shrouded in mystery. They have crossed paths with countless beings and civilizations, their actions influencing the course of events in subtle, unpredictable ways.",
  "abilities": ["Shapeshifter", "Cosmic Knowledge", "Mysterious Aura", "Adaptive Tactics", "Influence Destiny"]
}
